content: Are we allowed to create our own invite link to invite our family and friends?

## Yes!
Go to the server menu and choose Invite Friends.
I assume theres a strict verification process to make sure we dont get any trolls or MAGA?
We can track the invited folks back to you. So if you do invite trolls, they'll be banned and so will you.
What if that was never the intention?
We believe you are good person, supporting Kamala and Tim, and you have good friends that will join us here to support Kamala and Tim.
Is there another way someone can find the link?
We give the link to everyone that comes to a training event https://events.democrats.org or on Reach, it was also broadcast at the DNC convention
I'll do that insted.  Dont want to take any chances
Many thanks!
We prefer folks come to training first, that way they know more about what we do, and they are more engaged.
Is it ok share this link with my friend?: https://events.democrats.org/event/671638/
Yes, you can share that with your friend. That is a great place to start.
How can I volunteer to be a content creator, like will there be a training event for that, or has there already been one?
No, the [Content Brigade](https://events.democrats.org/event/637836/) doesn't train.  It's seeking skilled creators, which is why an application is required.
Ok, thank you!

Hey Val, it's wonderful you want to share your creativity with the campaign. Content Brigade is pretty full and it might be a while before you hear form them, I encourage to join one of our teams while you are waiting, if you like creating for Tiktok we have a training coming up for that team https://events.democrats.org/event/634652/

Would creating small campaign  edits be considered content creation? I’m wanting to create content through that way. I also want to do fact checking to, like add in background information about the candidate(s) history

Hi <@1150772431175290933> I appreciate your enthusiasm and anything you do with the campaign is one more step towards the win. The Content Brigade has writers, editing would be part of that. Fact checking is done at the campaign level, you can apply for Communications or Creatives positions here https://kamalaharris.com/work-with-us/
Never mind I guess. I was wanting to do like fun creative edits like the ones on my Instagram page,  but I think the  creative positions of the campaign are beyond my expertise.
Probably best towait to hear from Content Brigade. You can also share your own content in https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1265762143559618624
Ok, cool!
